articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Command of KPA Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Command of KPA Unit
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il inspected the command of KPA Unit 955.
					 Conducted by the unit commander, Kim Jong Il looked round the room devoted to the unit's history.
					
					 The unit which was organized and grew up under the care of President Kim Il Sung is strong in its combat capacity as it has displayed popular heroism in defending the country, building socialism and protecting the life and property of the people, he said, highly appreciating the feats performed by it in the past.
					
					 He underscored the need for the soldiers of the unit to thoroughly carry out the last instructions of the President and exalt its honor as a praiseworthy unit.
					
					 Going round entertainment and educational facilities including the servicepersons' hall, he praised the unit for having trained servicepersons to be men strong in ideology firmly equipped with the revolutionary idea of the WPK and the transparent working class awareness after building good entertainment and educational centers and putting their operations on a regular basis.
					
					 A fresh turn has been effected in the politico-ideological and fighting traits of the servicepersons and the might of the KPA has remarkably grown stronger in the Songun era, he said, adding that socialist cause in the DPRK is sure to triumph as the invincible army replete with the spirit of devotedly defending the leader is standing guard over the defence line of the country.
					
					 Walking in the compound of the barracks, he acquainted himself with how the unit manages itself and praised the servicepersons of the unit for keeping the exterior of the barracks neat and tidy and having planted many trees in and around the compound to add to the beautiful landscape of the country.
					
					 He made the rounds of such supply service facilities as a mess hall, a kitchen and a non-staple food store to take deep care of the soldiers' living.
					
					 Pleased to see the unit providing the soldiers with good living conditions by developing the side-line farming and assiduously managing its economic life, he highly praised the spirit of self-reliance and fortitude.
					
					 He expressed the expectation and conviction that the servicepersons of the unit would creditably discharge their honorable mission and duty as standard-bearers and a shock brigade in carrying out the WPK's Songun politics. He had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Art Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed an art performance given by the State Merited Chorus together with workers in Jagang Province.
					 Among the audience were Pak To Chun, chief secretary of the Jagang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, department director of the C.C., WPK, Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Je Gang, first vice department directors of the same, and KPA Generals Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su and leading officials of the provincial-level organs.
					
					 The chorus honored with Kim Il Sung Order put on the stage choruses "Song of General Kim Jong Il," "Song of the Korean People's Army," "The Road of Victory" and male solo and choruses "Desire of a Soldier" and "Song of Comradeship" and other numbers.
					
					 The artistes sang high praises of the leadership exploits Kim Jong Il has performed in strengthening and developing the revolutionary armed forces and building a rich and powerful country, holding aloft the banner of Songun, and successfully represented the firm faith and will of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche true to the leadership of the WPK.
					
					 At the end of the performance he warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering performers and audience. He congratulated the artistes on their successful presentation.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the artistes of the State Merited Chorus gave a splendid performance flawless in the ideological content and artistry as it is replete with the confidence and will of Korea and the revolutionary soldier spirit. He highly appreciated the successful performance and extended thanks to the artistes.
					
					 The workers in Jagang Province, the creators of the Kanggye spirit, are the heroic workers who pulled through grave difficulties with the indomitable revolutionary spirit and persevering will, holding higher the red flag of the revolution during the "Arduous March," forced march when the country was undergoing the most rigorous trial, he noted, expressing great expectation and conviction that they would continue to play a vanguard role in the all-out charge for building  a great prosperous powerful nation with the same spirit and mettle as they displayed in those days.

articles.title: Day of Victory of Cuban Revolution Observed
articles.content:
Day of Victory of Cuban Revolution Observed
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK Jose Manuel Galego Montano hosted a reception on Thursday on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of the victory of the Cuban revolution.
					 Present there on invitation were Vice-President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly Yang Hyong Sop, Minister of Education Kim Yong Jin who is chairman of the Korea-Cuba Solidarity Committee, Minister of Agriculture Ri Kyong Sik, Acting Chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries Mun Jae Chol and diplomatic envoys of different countries here. 
					
					 Staff members of the Cuban embassy were present there.
					
					Jose Manuel Galego Montano in his speech at the reception referred to the fact that the Cuban people achieved the country's full independence through a protracted struggle under the guidance of Fidel Castro Ruz.
					
					 He said that the Cuban people have registered great successes in various fields such as education, culture and public health despite the imperialists' persistent blockade.
					
					 He expressed gratitude to the fraternal Korean people for having voiced strong support to the Cuban people's struggle.
					
					 He wished the heroic Korean people great success in the future, too, under the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Il. He stressed that Cuba would make positive efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop in his speech recalled that Fidel Castro Ruz and other Cuban revolutionaries waged a heroic armed struggle, thus toppling the pro-U.S. dictatorial regime and building a genuine country for the people and establishing a socialist system.
					
					 He said that the Cuban government and people have dynamically advanced along the road chosen by themselves under the correct guidance of their leadership and further elevated the country's international prestige.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to steadily develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Cuba, he noted, expressing belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow more vital in the future, too.

articles.title: Many Fine Art Works Registered as National Treasure
articles.content:
Many Fine Art Works Registered as National Treasure
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Lots of fine art works created this year have been registered as national treasure.
					 Among them are the pencil drawing "He says that the land belongs to the peasants who till it" showing the immortal feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in satisfying the century-old desire of the peasants, the Korean painting "Even at a midnight of mid-summer" depicting the leadership traits of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who always finds himself on the way of on-the-spot guidance for the happiness of the people and the oil painting "Sunday of the mother" showing the warm affection of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk for the bereaved children of revolutionaries for whom she devoted the rest on Sunday.
					
					 The newly-registered fine art pieces also include the poster "Let us beat louder the drum for general advance!", truthful oil paintings "Land distributed by the General" and "The time for preparing kimchi for the winter", the sculpture "Our chief sergeant" which is perfect in formative art and the Korean painting "Green forest" which embodies the unique form of national fine art.
					
					 The Korean painting "Bumper crop", oil paintings "In the same trench" and "The third spring" and sculpture "Heavily raining evening" and the like show the inherent ideological emotion and feelings of the nation, dynamic and varied strokes, unique and individual technique and high artistic talent of the artists. They enrich the treasure house of Juche fine art.
					
					 For their clear ideological and thematic contents and rich artistic quality, the works were highly appreciated and registered as national treasures at the festivals and exhibitions held this year.

articles.title: Cultural Heritages, Pride of Nation
articles.content:
Cultural Heritages, Pride of Nation
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- Cultural heritages are throwing brighter rays as a pride of the nation in this land with a long history of fifty centuries.
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il possessed of ardent love of the country and the nation looked round the monument to the great victory in the battle in the northern area of Korea, a historical remain in Rimmyong-ri, Kim Chaek City, North Hamgyong Province, in May this year.
					
					 In spite of the urgency of his affairs in his journey of Songun leadership, he gave precious instructions to preserve and manage cultural heritages of the nation with good care. Inspired by his noble love of the nation, people immensely boosted the social morale of taking good care of cultural assets this year.
					
					 In Kangwon Province with a lot of scenic spots such as Mt. Kumgang and time-honored historical relics and remains, one hundred and scores of old buildings, walls, beacon sites and tombs of great value as national treasures were repaired and rearranged to preserve their original state. They include the Murungri Mountain Walls, the Songbukri Stone Castle in Ichon County and the Hyonri Mountain Walls and Chari Beacon Site in Sepho County.
					
					 A brisk work was undertaken to restore to its original state the Sokwang Temple which embraces the cultural heritage of architecture of the Korean people covering 500-odd years from the end of the 14th century to the early 20th century.
					
					 The repair of historical remains such as the Saemaul Old Tomb and the Komsan Beacon Site was completed in South Phyongan Province and work for preserving the brick tomb in Saenal-ri, Sinchon County, Anak Tomb No. 3 and other objects made a successful progress in South Hwanghae Province.
					
					 The Myohyangsan History Museum, a leading base of preservation of cultural relics and remains and a base of education in national cultural tradition, has completed the record of preservation of relics which generalizes the course of the collection of historical relics, the method of preventing their aging, preserving measures, etc. and published an e-book giving an orderly review of the relics and remains in Mt. Myohyang.
					
					 Along with this, it has carried out the repair of 30-odd old buildings on a high level to restore them to their original state and made a progress in the work for preserving and managing natural monuments and collecting and unearthing many more new historical relics and remains.
					
					 Besides, many cultural relics and remains across the country have been repaired well and restored to their original state on the principle of historicism.
					
					 The cultural relics and remains handed down through generations inspire the Korean people with national pride and powerfully push them forward in the building of a great, prosperous and powerful socialist nation.

articles.title: Struggle for Independence against U.S. Called for
articles.content:
Struggle for Independence against U.S. Called for 
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- If the south Korean people are to bring earlier national reunification while promoting the independent and democratic development of the society as required by the trend of the times, they should intensify the struggle for independence against the U.S., first of all. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The above-said struggle of the south Korean people is a just and patriotic struggle for putting an end to the U.S. policy of domination and military presence in south Korea and achieving independence, democracy and reunification and it is a requirement of their life.
					
					 The south Korean people are well aware through their life experience that the U.S. is neither "friend" nor "helper" nor "protector" but is the root cause of all sorts of misfortune and sufferings they have undergone.
					
					 The vigorous struggle for democracy against fascism being waged by the people from all walks of life in south Korea is closely linked with the struggle for independence against the U.S.
					
					 This struggle now under way in south Korea under the U.S. occupation and domination is a priority task for achieving social democracy. The struggle for democracy against fascism is an important factor of putting an end to the U.S. colonial domination and promoting the independence of the south Korean society. This indicates that only when the south Korean people combine the above-said two forms of struggle and dynamically wage both of them can they frustrate the moves of foreign forces and the Lee Myung Bak clique of traitors, their lackeys, against the nation and achieve the social justice and democratic development and accomplish the cause of national reunification.
					
					 It is foolish, indeed, to have an illusion about the U.S. or pin any hope on it, the article notes, calling for carrying on the struggle for independence against the U.S. till the U.S. military presence and domination over south Korea are brought to an end.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' "Theory of Giving Priority to S. Korea-U.S. Relations" Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' "Theory of Giving Priority to S. Korea-U.S. Relations" Blasted
Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The "theory of giving priority to the south Korea-U.S. relations" which runs through the domestic and foreign policy of the Lee Myung Bak regime is a humiliating theory of giving priority to foreign forces and submitting to the U.S. as it calls for subordinating everything to the interests and requirements of the U.S. in utter disregard of the destiny of the country and the nation, and a disgusting theory of sycophancy towards the U.S. as it calls for faithfully serving the U.S., Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in its commentator's article.
					 The above-said theory vividly reflects Lee's sycophancy toward the U.S. and his national nihilism characterized by worship and submission to the U.S., extreme rejection and disregard of his compatriots as well as his political ignorance, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The successive puppet rulers in south Korea have pursued the policy of kowtowing to the U.S. talking about "alliance" with the U.S. But there was no such sycophant and spiritless traitor to the nation as Lee Myung Bak who openly chose the theory of giving precedence to foreign forces as its political watchword while placing them above the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The article cites following facts to prove that the Lee regime committed such unpardonable acts of treachery as throwing south Korea into deeper abyss of U.S. domination and subjugation and putting the inter-Korean relations to stalemate, in zealous pursuance of sycophancy and treachery and the moves for confrontation with the DPRK, guided by the above-said theory:
					
					 The group of traitors is selling off the dignity and interests of the nation, lock, stock and barrel, after leaving south Korea to the tender mercy of the U.S., guided by the above-said theory and under the signboard of "strategic alliance in the 21st century" based on the theory.
					
					 It is traitor Lee's view on the U.S. that south Korea can not exist without the U.S. and it can "prosper" only when it is backed by the U.S.
					
					 Lee is bereft of elementary morality and an iota of reason and national conscience as he is keen on serving the U.S. This traitor is subordinating the inter-Korean relations to the south Korea-U.S. relations while putting foreign forces above compatriots.
					
					 He is employing every possible trick, much afraid that the U.S. may join hands with the DPRK, pushing south Korea aside.
					
					 He asserts that the improved U.S.-south Korea relations would be beneficial to the inter-Korean relations. This is nothing but sheer nonsense reminding one of a behavior welcoming a robber to one's house.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak does not know much about philosophy and politics. If he has any, it is nothing but "pragmatic diplomacy" centering on the U.S., a copy of U.S.-style "pragmatism," and the policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen, pursuant to the U.S. DPRK strategy for aggression.
					
					 The "theory of giving priority to south Korea-U.S. relations" advocated by him is little short of his pledge to adopt it as the top priority goal of his domestic and foreign policy to act a servant for the U.S. in executing its policy of a war of aggression and a shock brigade in carrying out its policy for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 The theory, indeed, is the thrice-cursed, despicable and wicked one for exterminating the nation as it is aimed at bringing only disasters to the nation.
					
					 No wonder south Koreans are becoming increasingly critical of the group of traitors' crimes.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when traitors could prolong their remaining days by relying on the U.S.
					
					Lee Myung Bak would be well advised to face up to the trend of the world and drop his anachronistic policy of giving priority to outsiders, though belatedly.
					
					 Giving precedence to outsiders is certain to lead the nation to ruin, the article says, stressing that the criminal theory is bound to go bankrupt due to the strong trend of the June 15 era of independent reunification making a dynamic advance under the banner of "By our nation itself."

articles.title: GNP's Arbitrary Action Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
GNP's Arbitrary Action Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- The opposition parties including the Democratic Labor Party of south Korea strongly protested against the south Korean Grand National Party's arbitrary act of railroading the 2009 budget bill through the puppet National Assembly.
					 They accused the GNP of railroading the budget bill through the NA without any consultation with them.
					
					They charged that the ruling party cleared the way the military dictators did the budget bill which reflected only the expenses for the "construction" of what it called "a big canal" and the expenses for Phohang, the area represented by Lee Sang Duk, member of the NA from the GNP who is elder brother of Lee Myung Bak, disregarding the funds for providing jobs and stabilizing people's living, etc.
					
					 The opposition parties demanded the GNP apologize for this wrong action.

articles.title: Important Days of DPRK to Be Commemorated in Britain
articles.content:
Important Days of DPRK to Be Commemorated in Britain
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- A British preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 in 2009 was inaugurated in London on Dec. 11.
					 Harpal Brar, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events in London and local cities of the country on the occasions of the said significant holidays next year.

articles.title: Significant Days of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Significant Days of DPRK Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 19 (KCNA) -- A round-table talk and lectures took place in Romania, Indonesia and Guinea on Dec. 12 on the occasions of the 17th anniversary of General Secretary
					Kim Jong Il's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the 91st birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania and chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Romania, stressed at the round-table talk that Kim Jong Suk, mother of Korea, performed great merits by participating in the anti-Japanese armed struggle as the closest comrade-in-arms of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					The director of an Indonesian company said at a lecture that guided by Supreme Commander 
						Kim Jong Il, the KPA has grown up to be an invincible army able to fight square against the U.S. styling itself the "only superpower" and creditably discharged its mission and role as the driving force in carrying out the cause of socialism.
					
					 Malik Souma, director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea, said at a lecture that there have been many great persons praised as Amazon in history, but it is hard to find such heroine as Kim Jong Suk who had fought bloody battles, risking her life with arms in her hands for many years.
					
					 The exploits performed by Kim Jong Suk in the course of the struggle for the liberation of the country and freedom of the people will remain forever in the history of the Korean nation with the titles of "woman commander of Mt. Paektu" and "legendary anti-Japanese war woman commander", he stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno fabrica de maquinaria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno fabrica de maquinaria
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Maquinaria donde trabaja Ri Jong Ok.
					Sobre todo, hizo conocimiento detallado de la situacion de renovacion tecnologica y produccion recorriendo varios lugares de la fabrica.
					
					Aprecio altamente el hecho de que la clase obrera de aqui registro un desarrollo vertiginoso en la produccion de maquinaria al dar buen impulso a la modernizacion y la cientifizacion conforme a la demanda de la era de industria informatica.
					
					Esta fabrica enfoco las fuerzas a la transformacion tecnologica en pleno acato a la idea del partido de dar importancia a la ciencia abriendo asi las posibilidades de elevar trascendentalmente en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo los productos mecanicos ahorrando en gran medida la mano de obra y de asegurar en un alto nivel la cultura productiva y la de vida, senalo.
					
					Anadio que esta maravillosa realidad sirve de buena muestra de la justeza e inagotable vitalidad de la orientacion sobre la revolucion tecnologica, que mantiene invariablemente el PTC.
					
					Subrayo que si realizan la modernizacion y la cientifizacion a base de la ciencia y tecnica de punta fortaleciendo sin cesar el caracter Juche de la economia nacional como esta fabrica, sera posible poner de pleno manifiesto la superioridad y la vitalidad de nuestra economia nacional independiente y agrego que todas las ramas deben seguir el ejemplo de los empleados de la fabrica para registrar un cambio revolucionario en la renovacion tecnica.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente recorrio el comedor, bano, biblioteca, sala de propaganda y otras instalaciones culturales y de intendencia, acondicionados limpia y ordenadamente en los talleres de produccion y averiguo el estado de la labor de intendencia para los obreros.
					
					Aprecio que el esplendido cambio dado en esta fabrica se debe enteramente a los funcionarios quienes realizaron incesantes pensamientos, indagaciones y esfuerzos tenaces por facilitar mejores condiciones de vida a los obreros, responsables de la produccion, y continuo que las experiencias de esta planta comprueban con hechos la gran veracidad de la instruccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung de que la intendencia es precisamente el trabajo politico.
					
					Finalmente, el Dirigente se fotografio junto a los tecnicos y los innovadores laborales de la fabrica.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Jagang, Pak To Chun, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Je Gang, y los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il inspecciona comandancia de la Unidad No. 955 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il inspecciona comandancia de la Unidad No. 955 del EPC
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del  Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea (EPC), inspecciono la comandancia de la Unidad No. 955 del EPC.
					Guiado por el jefe de la unidad, el Dirigente recorrio la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Aprecio altamente los meritos acumulados en el pasado por la unidad destacando que esta nacida y crecida en el regazo del Presidente Kim Il Sung es el destacamento con fuerte combatividad que desplego el heroismo masivo en la defensa de la patria, la construccion socialista y la proteccion de la vida y bienes del pueblo.
					
					Senalo que los militares deben exaltar mas el honor de su unidad con muchos orgullos materializando cabalmente el legado del Presidente.
					
					Durante el recorrido por la Casa de Militares y otros establecimientos de cultura y educacion, elogio el hecho de que la unidad forma a los militares como los fuertes en la ideologia armados firmemente con la idea revolucionaria del PTC y la inflexible conciencia clasista normalizando la operacion de esas facilidades excelentemente acondicionadas.
					
					Subrayo que se registro un nuevo cambio en los rasgos politico-ideologicos y el estilo de lucha de los militares del EPC en la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) y crecio considerablemente el poderio de estas fuerzas armadas.
					
					 Agrego que la causa socialista de Corea marchara siempre victoriosa porque defiende las trincheras de la patria ese gran ejercito invencible, armado al tope con el espiritu de defensa a ultranza al lider.
					
					Caminando en el recinto del cuartel, el Dirigente se cercioro del estado de administracion de la unidad y elogio que los militares mantienen limpia la parte exterior del cuartel, en particular, contribuyen al embellecimiento de la naturaleza de la patria plantando muchos arboles en el recinto y el contorno del cuartel.
					
					Presto profunda atencion a la vida de los militares visitando el comedor, la cocina, el deposito de alimentos subsidiarios y otras instalaciones de intendencia.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que la unidad asegura excelentes condiciones de vida a los militares desarrollando las faenas de autoabastecimiento y organizando hacendosamente la vida economica, evaluo altamente el espiritu de autoconfianza y lucha tenaz de los militares.
					
					Expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que los militares cumpliran excelentemente su honrosa mision y deber del abanderado y brigada de choque en acatar la politica de Songun del PTC, se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron los generales de ejercito del EPC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Banquete por el aniversario 50 del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana
articles.content:
Banquete por el aniversario 50 del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 50o aniversario del triunfo de la Revolucion Cubana, el embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica de Cuba en Corea, Jose Manuel Galego Montano, ofrecio la vispera una recepcion.
					A la ocasion fueron invitados el vicepresidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Yang Hyong Sop, el ministro de Educacion y presidente del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba, Kim Yong Jin, el ministro de Agricultura Ri Kyong Sik, el presidente interino del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Mun Jae Chol asi como los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises acreditados en Corea.
					
					Participaron tambien los miembros de la embajada cubana.
					
					En su discurso el embajador cubano se refirio a que bajo la direccion del companero Fidel Castro Ruz el pueblo cubano logro la independencia total del pais mediante una larga lucha.
					
					Subrayo que a pesar de las brutales maniobras de bloqueo de los imperialistas, el pueblo cubano alcanzo grandes exitos en la educacion, cultura, salud publica y otras ramas.
					
					Expreso agradecimiento al hermano pueblo coreano que dio su activo respaldo y apoyo a la lucha del pueblo cubano.
					
					Deseo que el heroico pueblo coreano logre grandes exitos tambien en el futuro bajo la direccion del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Il y expuso su decision de esforzarse activamente por ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.
					
					Yang Hyong Sop recordo en su intervencion que el companero Fidel Castro Ruz y otros revolucionarios cubanos derrocaron el regimen dictatorial proyanqui a traves de una heroica lucha armada y construyeron un autentico pais del pueblo y el sistema socialista.
					
					Apunto que bajo la correcta guia de su direccion, el gobierno y el pueblo cubanos avanzan a pasos firmes por el camino optado por si mismos y consolidan la posicion del pais en el extranjero.
					
					Ratifico la invariable posicion del PTC y el gobierno de la RPDC de consolidar constantemente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que estos tradicionales vinculos se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran con vigor tambien en lo adelante.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun comenta teoria de autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun comenta teoria de autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 19 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun publico este viernes el articulo de un comentarista criticando fuertemente la "teoria de dar prioridad a las relaciones Sur de Corea-EE.UU.", de la cual esta penetrada la politica exterior e interior del "poder" de Lee Myung Bak.
					Esta teoria tan humillante y sucia exige sujetar lo todo a los intereses y demandas de EE.UU., servirle y obedecerle incondicionalmente, comienza el comentarista y prosigue:
					
					En ella estan reflejados el punto de vista servil a EE.UU. y el nihilismo nacional de Lee Myung Bak, caracterizados por el culto y sumision a EE.UU., la exclusion y desprecio a su nacion, la estupidez e ignorancia politicas de este traidor.
					
					Si bien todos los gobernantes titeres del Sur de Corea abogaron por las relaciones de "alianza" con EE.UU. y se apelaron a la politica servil a este imperio, ninguno fue tan vendepatria como Lee que presento abiertamente la teoria en cuestion como la esencia de su politica exterior poniendo a las fuerzas foraneas por encima de los connacionales.
					
					En virtud de la polemica teoria, el "poder" de Lee recurre obstinadamente al servilismo a grandes potencias y a las maniobras conflictivas con la RPDC cometiendo asi el imperdonable crimen antinacional de meter al Sur de Corea en el peor abismo de dominacion y subyugacion de EE.UU. y llevar al caos las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					La banda de ese traidor entrego a EE.UU. todo el territorio surcoreano bajo el rotulo de la "alianza estrategica del siglo 21" basada en dicha teoria vendiendo la dignidad y los intereses nacionales.
					
					El punto de vista de Lee sobre EE.UU. consiste en que el Sur de Corea no puede existir sin el imperio y se "prosperara" con la ayuda de este.
					
					El traidor Lee, quien esta loco por servir a EE.UU. y no tiene ni la mas minima conciencia nacional, sujeta las relaciones Norte-Sur a los vinculos con las fuerzas extranjeras anteponiendo a estas a los coterraneos sin ningun sentido de obligacion moral ni razon.
					
					Ahora la horda de Lee utiliza con impaciencia todas las artimanas para impedir que EE.UU. establezca las relaciones con la RPDC de manera directa.
					
					El fortalecimiento de las relaciones EE.UU.-Sur de Corea conviene a los vinculos intercoreanos, esto no pasa de ser un sofisma igual a alabar la invitacion a un bandido a la casa.
					
					Lee no tiene su propia filosofia ni politica. 
					
					Por eso, practica la "diplomacia pragmatica" centrada en EE.UU. imitando el "pragmatismo" al estilo norteamericano y la politica de enfrentamiento fratricida en pro del cumplimiento de la agresiva estrategia del imperio sobre Corea.
					
					Abogar por la "teoria de dar prioridad a las relaciones Sur de Corea-EE.UU." significa el juramento de que tomaria como la meta de mayor prioridad de la politica exterior e interior servir como mercenario y brigada de choque en la eventual guerra contra la RPDC para el cumplimiento de la politica norteamericana en este sentido.
					
					Realmente, tal teoria imperdonable y mas siniestra impone calamidades a la nacion coreana y persigue la exterminacion y arruinamiento de ella.
					
					Pero, en el Sur de Corea se alzan cada dia mas las voces denunciando los crimenes traidores de la banda de Lee. Ya paso el tiempo en que vivian del servilismo a EE.UU.
					
					Lee debe abandonar su anacronica politica de dar preferencia a las fuerzas extrajeras viendo correctamente como marchan las cosas en este mundo.
					
					Anteponer a las fuerzas extranjeras es la senda hacia el arruinamiento y la muerte. Esa criminal teoria de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas se hara anicos ante la corriente de la epoca de reunificacion independiente iniciada el 15 de Junio que avanza bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
